content: > size this pattern is designed in 5 sizes toddler child adult s m l fits hand 5 6 7 7 75 8 5 around mitten length 7 25 8 5 10 5 12 13 from cuff to finger tips adjustable cuff length 2 5 2 75 3 3 15 3 5 adjustable > materials us 4 3 5mm circular needles or us 4 3 5mm double pointed needles or size needed to obtain gauge us 2 ½ 3 mm circular needles or us 2 ½ 3 mm double pointed needles or one size smaller than gauge needle any aran/worsted weight yarn 40 60 80 100 120 g this is approximate so as the yardage will vary depends on your type of yarn > gauge 10 x 10 cm 4 x 4 inch = 20 stitches in width and 24 row/rounds on us 4 3 5mm in height with stockinette stitch after blocking this pattern is written in us english terms copyright notice you may not reproduce any of the photos or the text without obtaining written permission first thank you
